schedule.title: Introduction to AI
schedule.description: Reflect on your initial thoughts about AI and what you hope to learn
prompts: What are your current perceptions of AI?
What aspects of AI are you most curious about?
How do you think AI might impact your future career?

schedule.title: Machine Learning Basics
schedule.description: Explore the technical foundations of machine learning
prompts: How would you explain machine learning to a non-technical friend?
What surprised you about how machines 'learn'?
Which ML algorithm concept was most challenging to understand?

schedule.title: Ethics in AI
schedule.description: Consider the ethical implications of AI systems
prompts: What ethical concerns do you have about AI development?
How can we ensure AI systems are fair and unbiased?
What responsibilities do AI developers have to society?

schedule.title: AI in Healthcare
schedule.description: Explore innovative applications of AI in healthcare
prompts: What innovative AI applications in healthcare excite you most?
How might AI transform patient care in the next decade?
What creative solutions could AI provide for global health challenges?

schedule.title: Natural Language Processing
schedule.description: Dive into how machines understand human language
prompts: What technical challenges exist in teaching machines to understand context?
How do transformers and attention mechanisms work conceptually?
What are the limitations of current NLP technologies?

schedule.title: AI and Society
schedule.description: Examine AI's broader impact on society
prompts: How is AI changing the nature of work and employment?
What responsibilities do we have in shaping AI's role in society?
How can we ensure equitable access to AI benefits?

schedule.title: Computer Vision
schedule.description: Explore creative applications of computer vision
prompts: What innovative uses of computer vision have you encountered?
How could computer vision be creatively applied in your field of interest?
What new possibilities does visual AI open up?

schedule.title: AI Safety and Alignment
schedule.description: Consider how to build safe and aligned AI systems
prompts: What does 'AI alignment' mean to you?
How can we ensure AI systems remain beneficial as they become more powerful?
What safety measures should be mandatory for AI development?

schedule.title: Collaborative AI
prompts: How can humans and AI systems best work together?
What makes for effective human-AI teams?
How should we design AI to enhance rather than replace human capabilities?

schedule.title: AI in Education
schedule.description: Critically analyze AI's role in education
prompts: What are the benefits and risks of AI in education?
How might AI change the way we learn and teach?
What critical questions should we ask about educational AI?

schedule.title: Future of AI
schedule.description: Envision the future possibilities of AI
prompts: What breakthrough AI applications do you envision in the next 20 years?
How might AI reshape entire industries?
What creative solutions could AI provide for climate change?

schedule.title: Personal AI Journey
schedule.description: Reflect on your learning journey and future with AI
prompts: How have your views on AI changed throughout this course?
What was your most significant learning moment?
How will you apply what you've learned about AI?
